name: Maharaj Market
description: {'Location': ['69 Maharaj 7 Alley, Pak Nam, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81000, Thailand.'], 'Main Features': ['Fresh Produce: Offers a wide variety of fresh fruits, vegetables, meats, and seafood.', 'Local Cuisine: Numerous stalls serve traditional Thai dishes and snacks.', 'Cultural Experience: Provides insight into daily life and culinary practices of Krabi locals.'], 'Main Stores': ['Vegetable and Fruit Sections: Extensive selection of local produce.', 'Prepared Food Stalls: Vendors offer ready-to-eat meals and traditional sweets.', 'Flower Market: Dedicated area for fresh flowers and garlands.'], 'Working Hours': ['Daily from 3:00 AM to 10:00 AM.']}

name: Pattaya Floating Market
